name: Crustalli
tag_list: games, apps, mobile, apple, iphone, ipod, ipad
overview:
Crustalli is an English computer game developing company established in January 2011. The company’s headquarters is located in London, UK. It became well-known for developing games for the devices based on iOS platforms. The main Crustalli’s objective is developing and promoting innovative and exciting games. Its most popular game is Kick the Buddy. The company’s games are available on different platforms including computers and mobile devices. These platforms include Mac, iPhone/iPod and iPad.

Apple, the Apple logo, iPhone, iPod and iPad are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. All other marks and trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
